description: User shall be able to register for a new account using their email address and a secure password.
User shall be able to log in to their existing account using their registered email address and password.
User shall be able to create a new project, providing a project name and an optional description.
User shall be able to view a list of all projects they are a member of or have created.
User shall be able to add new tasks to a specific project, including a task title, description, assignee, and due date.
User shall be able to view all tasks within a selected project, with options to filter by status (e.g., 'To Do', 'In Progress', 'Done') and assignee.
User shall be able to update the status of a task (e.g., from 'To Do' to 'In Progress').
User shall be able to assign or reassign a task to another team member within the same project.
System shall send email notifications to users when a task is assigned to them or when a task they assigned is marked as 'Done'.
User shall be able to add comments to a task to facilitate discussion and provide updates.
User shall be able to search for tasks across all their projects by keywords in the title or description.
